title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 833.3 - Administrative agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 833.3 - Administrative agreements

State Regulations

The executive director is authorized and directed to enter
into cooperative administrative agreements with Federal and State regulatory
agencies concerned with the review of projects under Federal or State law as
follows: (a) to facilitate the
submission and review of applications and the determinations required under
section
3.8
of the Compact; (b) to avoid unnecessary duplication of staff
functions and hearings required by law; and
(c) for such other and different purposes as
he may deem feasible and advantageous for the administration of the Compact or
any other law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
833.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
